alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:03PM MDT until June 17 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTY... At 503 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 25 miles east of Sheridan, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported ping pong ball size hail in Ucross. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clearmont and Leiter. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
